author: Associated Press
title: NYC Mayor de Blasio Urges for a National Enlistment Program for Doctors
description: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio called for a national enlistment program for doctors and nurses to handle an expected surge in coronavirus cases.
content: (NEW YORK) — New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio called Friday for a national enlistment program for doctors and nurses to handle an expected surge in coronavirus cases in New York and other places around the country where virus cases are straining existing he… [+1216 chars]
